00015 #ifndef SCRIPT_H
00016 #define SCRIPT_H
00017 
00018 
00019 // defines for conditional compilation: in this way you can choose
00020 // at compile-time which interpreter you want to support: this is 
00021 // very useful when you have not time to get all the libs for all
00022 // the interpreters supported by wxScript.
00023 //
00024 // To define this, you should use the universal -D (or /D for MSVC)
00025 // compile option in your makefiles for all the wxScript source files:
00026 //
00027 //    gcc -c -DwxSCRIPT_NO_CINT src/script.cpp         [ example how the
00028 //    gcc -c -DwxSCRIPT_NO_CINT src/sclua.cpp       <--[ makefile output
00029 //    gcc -c -DwxSCRIPT_NO_CINT src/sccint.cpp         [ should appear
00030 //    [...]
00031 // 
00032 #ifndef wxSCRIPT_NO_CINT
00033 #define wxSCRIPT_USE_CINT
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 #ifndef wxSCRIPT_NO_UNDERC
00037 #define wxSCRIPT_USE_UNDERC
00038 #endif
00039 
00040 #ifndef wxSCRIPT_NO_LUA
00041 #define wxSCRIPT_USE_LUA
00042 #endif
00043 
00044 #ifndef wxSCRIPT_NO_PYTHON
00045 #define wxSCRIPT_USE_PYTHON
00046 #endif
00047

00065 #endif
00066 
00067 #ifndef wxSAFE_DELETE_ARRAY
00068 #define wxSAFE_DELETE_ARRAY(x)                  { if (x) delete [] x; x = NULL; }
00069 #endif

00130 class wxScriptTypeInfo
00131 {
00132 protected:
00133 
00138         wxString m_strName;
00139 
00140 public:
00141         wxScriptTypeInfo(const wxString &str = wxEmptyString) { Set(str); }
00142         wxScriptTypeInfo(wxScriptTypeGeneric type) { SetGenericType(type); }
00143         virtual ~wxScriptTypeInfo() {}
00144 
00145         // miscellaneous
00146         virtual void DeepCopy(const wxScriptTypeInfo *p)                { m_strName = p->m_strName; }
00147         virtual bool Match(const wxScriptTypeInfo &p) const             { return (GetName().IsSameAs(p.GetName(), FALSE)); }
00148         virtual bool Match(const wxScriptTypeInfo *p) const             { return p != NULL && Match(*p); }
00149         friend bool operator==(const wxScriptTypeInfo &first, const wxScriptTypeInfo &second) 
00150                 { return first.Match(second); }
00151 
00152         // setters
00153         virtual void Set(const wxString &str);
00154         virtual void SetGenericType(wxScriptTypeGeneric t);
00155         virtual void SetAsPointer()                     { Set(GetName() + wxT("*")); }
00156         virtual void SetAsReference()           { Set(GetName() + wxT("&")); }
00157         
00158         // getters
00159         wxString GetPointerTypeName() const;
00160         wxString GetName() const                                                { return m_strName; }
00161         wxScriptTypeInfo GetPointerType() const                 { return wxScriptTypeInfo(GetPointerTypeName()); }
00162         wxScriptTypeGeneric GetGenericType() const;
00163 
00164         // checkers
00165         bool isPointer() const;
00166         bool isReference() const;
00167         bool isValid() const                    { return !m_strName.IsEmpty(); }
00168 };

00174 class wxScriptVar
00175 {
00176 protected:
00177 
00179         wxScriptTypeInfo m_tType;
00180 
00182         union {
00183                 long m_content;
00184                 double m_floatcontent;
00185         };
00186 
00187 public:
00188 
00190         wxScriptVar(const wxScriptVar &var) {
00191                 Copy(var);
00192         }
00193 
00194         wxScriptVar(const wxString &type = wxEmptyString, 
00195                                 const wxString &content = wxEmptyString) : m_content(0) {
00196                 SetType(type);
00197                 SetContent(content);
00198         }
00199 
00209         wxScriptVar(const wxString &type,
00210                                 int *pointer) : m_content((long)pointer) {
00211 
00212                 SetType(type);
00213                 wxASSERT(GetType().isPointer());
00214         }
00215 
00216         virtual ~wxScriptVar() { ResetContent(); }
00217 
00218 
00219         wxScriptVar &operator=(const wxScriptVar &tocopy)
00220                 { Copy(tocopy); return *this; }
00221 
00222 
00223 
00226 
00228         virtual void SetType(const wxString &str)               { m_tType.Set(str); }
00229 
00239         virtual void SetContent(const wxString &);
00240 
00241         virtual void SetContent(const wxChar *str)              { SetContent(wxString(str)); }
00242         virtual void SetContent(wxChar *str)                    { SetContent(wxString(str)); }
00243         virtual void SetContent(long l)                                 { m_content = l; }
00244         virtual void SetContent(double l)                               { m_floatcontent = l; }
00245         virtual void SetContent(bool l)                                 { m_content = (l != 0); }
00246         virtual void SetContent(void *l)                                { m_content = (long)l; }
00247         virtual void SetContent(const void *l)                  { m_content = (long)l; }
00248 
00250         void Set(const wxString &type, const wxString &content)         { SetType(type); SetContent(content); }
00251         void Set(wxScriptTypeGeneric type, char *content)                       { m_tType.SetGenericType(type); SetContent(content); }
00252         void Set(wxScriptTypeGeneric type, long content)                        { m_tType.SetGenericType(type); SetContent(content); }
00253         void Set(wxScriptTypeGeneric type, double content)                      { m_tType.SetGenericType(type); SetContent(content); }
00254         void Set(wxScriptTypeGeneric type, bool content)                        { m_tType.SetGenericType(type); SetContent(content); }
00255         void Set(wxScriptTypeGeneric type, void *content)                       { m_tType.SetGenericType(type); SetContent(content); }
00256         void Set(wxScriptTypeGeneric type, const wxString &content) { m_tType.SetGenericType(type); SetContent(content); }
00257 
00259         virtual void ResetContent();
00260 
00262         virtual void Copy(const wxScriptVar &var);
00263 
00265 
00266 
00267 
00270 
00272         wxScriptTypeInfo GetType() const        { return m_tType; }
00273 
00275         long GetContentLong() const                     { return m_content; }
00276 
00278         double GetContentDouble() const         { return (m_tType == wxSTG_INT || m_tType == wxSTG_LONG) ? m_content : m_floatcontent; }
00279 
00284         virtual wxString GetContentString() const;      
00285 
00288         virtual void *GetPointer() const        { return (m_tType.isPointer() ? (void*)m_content : NULL); }
00289 
00291 };

00296 class wxScriptFunction
00297 {
00298 protected:
00299 
00301         wxString m_strName;
00302 
00304         wxScriptTypeInfo m_tReturn;
00305 
00307         wxScriptTypeInfo m_pArgList[wxSCRIPTFNC_MAX_ARGS];
00308 
00310         int m_nArgCount;
00311 
00312 protected:
00313 
00316         wxString GetCallString(wxScriptVar *arr) const;
00317 
00318 public:
00319 
00321         wxScriptFunction(const wxString &name = wxEmptyString, 
00322                                         const wxString &ret = wxEmptyString,
00323                                         wxScriptTypeInfo *arr = NULL, int n = 0) { 
00324                 m_nArgCount = 0;
00325                 Set(name, ret, arr, n);
00326         }
00327 
00328         virtual ~wxScriptFunction() {}
00329 
00330 
00332         virtual void DeepCopy(const wxScriptFunction *tocopy) {
00333                 m_strName = tocopy->m_strName;
00334                 m_nArgCount = tocopy->m_nArgCount;
00335                 m_tReturn.DeepCopy(&tocopy->m_tReturn);
00336 
00337                 for (int i=0; i < m_nArgCount; i++)
00338                         m_pArgList[i].DeepCopy(&tocopy->m_pArgList[i]);
00339         }
00340 
00343         virtual wxScriptFunction *Clone() const = 0;
00344 
00347         virtual bool Match(const wxScriptTypeInfo *ret, int argc, ...);
00348 
00350         virtual bool Exec(wxScriptVar &ret, wxScriptVar *arg) const = 0;
00351 
00353         virtual void Set(const wxString &name, const wxString &ret, 
00354                                          wxScriptTypeInfo *arr, int n);
00355 
00356 
00359 
00361         wxString GetName() const        { return m_strName; }
00362 
00364         int GetArgCount() const         { return m_nArgCount; }
00365 
00367         wxScriptTypeInfo GetRetType() const                     { return m_tReturn; }
00368 
00370         wxScriptTypeInfo GetArgType(int n) const        { return m_pArgList[n]; }
00371 
00373 };

00379 {
00380 protected:

00395 
00396 public:
00397         wxScriptFunctionArray(const wxString &tostrip = wxEmptyString) : m_strToStrip(tostrip) {}
00398         virtual ~wxScriptFunctionArray() { Clear(); }
00399 
00400 
00401         // --------
00402         // Getters
00403         // --------
00404 
00405         wxScriptFunction *Get(int idx) const            { return (wxScriptFunction *)m_arr.Item(idx); }
00406         wxScriptFunction *Get(const wxString &fncname, int n = 0) const;
00407         int GetIdx(const wxString &fncname, int n = 0) const;
00408 
00409         int GetCountOf(const wxString &fncname) const;
00410         wxString GetName(int n) const;
00411         wxString GetPrefixToStrip() const                       { return m_strToStrip; }
00412         int GetCount() const                                            { return m_arr.GetCount(); }
00413         wxArrayPtrVoid &GetArray()                                      { return m_arr; }
00414 
00415 
00416         // --------------
00417         // Miscellaneous
00418         // --------------
00419 
00420         void Insert(wxScriptFunction *toadd, int idx);
00421         void Append(wxScriptFunction *toadd)                            { m_arr.Insert(toadd, GetCount()); }
00422         void Append(const wxScriptFunctionArray &arr);
00423 
00424         void Remove(int i);
00425         void Remove(const wxString &fncname, int n = 0)         { Remove(GetIdx(fncname, n)); }
00426 
00427         void SetPrefixToStrip(const wxString &str)                      { m_strToStrip = str; }
00428         void DeepCopy(const wxScriptFunctionArray *arr);
00429         void Clear();
00430 };

00435 enum wxScriptFileType {
00436 
00438         wxRECOGNIZE_FROM_EXTENSION = -2,
00439 
00443         wxRECOGNIZE_FROM_COMMENT = -1,
00444 
00445         wxCINT_SCRIPTFILE = 0,          // extension = "cxx"
00446         wxUNDERC_SCRIPTFILE = 1,        // extension = "uc"
00447         wxLUA_SCRIPTFILE = 2,           // extension = "lua"
00448         wxPYTHON_SCRIPTFILE = 3,        // extension = "py"
00449 
00450         wxSCRIPT_SUPPORTED_FORMATS = 4          // this must be the last
00451 };

00502 class wxScriptInterpreter
00503 {
00504 protected:              // use wxCINT::Get(), wxUnderC::Get() or wxLua::Get() to
00505                                 // access them...
00506 
00508         static wxCINT *m_pCINT;
00509         static wxUnderC *m_pUnderC;
00510         static wxLua *m_pLua;
00511         static wxPython *m_pPython;
00512 
00513 public:         // ctor & dtor
00514 
00515         wxScriptInterpreter();
00516         virtual ~wxScriptInterpreter();
00517 
00519         static wxString m_strLastErr;
00520 
00521 public:         // static functions
00522 
00523         // A STATIC function which returns the global instance of this class
00524         // cannot exist because wxScriptInterpreter is an abstract class
00525         // and thus, only derived classes (wxCINT, wxUnderC and wxLua) can
00526         // be instantiated; you can access them using their static Get()
00527         // functions: wxCINT::Get(), wxUnderC::Get() ....       
00528 
00530         static bool Init(bool bCINT = TRUE, bool bUnderC = TRUE, 
00531                                                 bool bLua = TRUE, bool bPython = TRUE);
00532 
00534         static void Cleanup();
00535 
00537         static bool areAllReady();
00538 
00541         static wxString GetLastErr()    { return m_strLastErr; }
00542 
00544         static void GetTotalFunctionList(wxScriptFunctionArray &);
00545 
00548         static wxScriptFile *Load(const wxString &filename, 
00549                         wxScriptFileType type = wxRECOGNIZE_FROM_EXTENSION);
00550 
00551 public:         // virtual functions
00552 
00554         virtual bool isReady() const = 0;
00555 
00557         virtual void GetFunctionList(wxScriptFunctionArray &) const = 0;
00558 
00563         virtual wxString GetVersionInfo() const = 0;
00564 };

00567 // to avoid a lot of repetitions
00568 #define wxSCRIPTFNC_IMPLEMENT_CLONE(x)            \
00569         virtual wxScriptFunction *Clone() const {     \
00570                 wxScriptFunction *newf = new x();         \
00571                 newf->DeepCopy(this);                     \
00572                 return newf; }    
00573 
00574 #endif          // SCRIPT_H
00575 
00576  about this interpreter or a wxEmptyString if
00580         virtual wxString GetVersionInfo() const = 0;
00581 };

00584 // to avoid a lot of repetitions
00585 #define wxSCRIPTFNC_IMPLEMENT_CLONE(x)            \
00586         virtual wxScriptFunction *Clone() const {     \
00587                 wxScriptFunction *newf = new x();         \
00588                 newf->DeepCopy(this);                     \
00589                 return newf; }
